about_the_game:
• Play as one of the three great leader in the year 1135 in the Middle East. Become Sultan of Egypt, King of Jerusalem or Emir of Aleppo.
  • Take control or rewrite history of the Middle East. King, Sultan or Emir, discover a fascinating tale and forge your destiny.


  • Build unique buildings, develop your Kingdom and improve your productions to face your neighbors and impose yourself.
  • Decree edits to increase your revenue, develop your external relations and maintain your position as a timeless ruler.
  • Pillage the territories of your neighbors to take their riches.
  • Take control of your rivals' territories and grow stronger.
  • Do not offend the Byzantine Empire or the Roum Sultanate to avoid incurring the wrath of these powerful nations.


  • Every turn, surprising events may happen. Make the best decisions for your own interests or for the interest of your subjects.
  • Manage your council to benefit from their support. Bribe them, choose decisions that will keep them and their powerful advtanges on your side.
  • Manage your diplomacy and wait for the right moment to strike your rivals while keeping an eye on the others.
detailed_description:
• Play as one of the three great leader in the year 1135 in the Middle East. Become Sultan of Egypt, King of Jerusalem or Emir of Aleppo.
  • Take control or rewrite history of the Middle East. King, Sultan or Emir, discover a fascinating tale and forge your destiny.


  • Build unique buildings, develop your Kingdom and improve your productions to face your neighbors and impose yourself.
  • Decree edits to increase your revenue, develop your external relations and maintain your position as a timeless ruler.
  • Pillage the territories of your neighbors to take their riches.
  • Take control of your rivals' territories and grow stronger.
  • Do not offend the Byzantine Empire or the Roum Sultanate to avoid incurring the wrath of these powerful nations.


  • Every turn, surprising events may happen. Make the best decisions for your own interests or for the interest of your subjects.
  • Manage your council to benefit from their support. Bribe them, choose decisions that will keep them and their powerful advtanges on your side.
  • Manage your diplomacy and wait for the right moment to strike your rivals while keeping an eye on the others.
name: Deus Lo Veult

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 8/10 64 bits
  • Processor: Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 8/10 64 bits
  • Processor: Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Play as one of the three great leader in the year 1135 in the Middle East. Become Sultan of Egypt, King of Jerusalem or Emir of Aleppo. Take control or rewrite history of the Middle East. King, Sultan or Emir, discover a fascinating tale and forge your destiny.
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
